functions.title: Misc Enchants v5
pages:
§lEfficiency IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a polished blackstone brick slab (P), a stone pickaxe (S), and a nether brick slab (N) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with lapis along the top and left side (L).
§lLLL
LB 
PSN§r

§lFortune I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a copper ore block as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lFortune II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two iron ore blocks as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R R§r
